    private final com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.Routine<Object, ${resultClassName}> mRoutine${methodCount};

    private static class ContextInvocationFactory${methodCount}${genericTypes} implements com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.invocation.ContextInvocationFactory<Object, ${resultClassName}> {

        @javax.annotation.Nonnull
        public String getInvocationType() {

            return ContextInvocation${methodCount}.class.getName();
        }

        @javax.annotation.Nonnull
        public com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.invocation.ContextInvocation<Object, ${resultClassName}> newInvocation(@javax.annotation.Nonnull Object... args) {

            return new ContextInvocation${methodCount}${genericTypes}((Class<?>) args[0], (String) args[1], (Object[]) args[2]);
        }
    }

    @javax.annotation.Nonnull
    private com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.Routine<Object, ${resultClassName}> initRoutine${methodCount}(
            @javax.annotation.Nonnull final com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder.RoutineConfiguration routineConfiguration,
            @javax.annotation.Nonnull final com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.builder.LoaderConfiguration loaderConfiguration) {

        final Object[] args = routineConfiguration.getFactoryArgsOr(com.gh.bmd.jrt.common.Reflection.NO_ARGS);
        return getBuilder(mContext, new ContextInvocationFactory${methodCount}${genericTypes}())
                                           .withRoutine()
                                           .with(routineConfiguration)
                                           ${routineBuilderOptions}
                                           .withFactoryArgs(mTargetClass, ${shareGroup}, args)
                                           .withInputMaxSize(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                                           .withInputTimeout(com.gh.bmd.jrt.time.TimeDuration.ZERO)
                                           .withOutputMaxSize(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                                           .withOutputTimeout(com.gh.bmd.jrt.time.TimeDuration.ZERO)
                                           .set()
                                           .withLoader()
                                           .with(loaderConfiguration)
                                           ${invocationBuilderOptions}
                                           .set()
                                           .buildRoutine();
    }
